title: Miracles
description: Signs of God's love and mercy that remind us nothing is impossible for Him. Stories that strengthen faith and invite us to trust in divine action.

lanciano.title: Eucharistic Miracle of Lanciano
lanciano.description: Consecrated host turned into flesh and wine into blood, verified by scientific studies.

guadalupe.title: Our Lady of Guadalupe
guadalupe.description: The image imprinted on Juan Diego's cloak remains intact for centuries, defying scientific explanation.

fatima.title: The Miracle of the Sun in FÃ¡tima
fatima.description: In front of thousands, the sun danced in the sky, spun around, and emitted multicolored lights.
